name: difference_newinfo
template:
Instruction:
 You determine whether a new posts adds any new information to a thread of social media posts. Classify the following text enclosed in double chevrons <<...>>, if it adds new information (1) or not (0) to the preceding posts, enclosed in single chevrons <...>.

Respond with only the predicted class (0 or 1) of the request.

Text: <<{text}>>, preceding posts: <{thread}>
